summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Galer Street, in the City of Seattle, from Seventeenth Avenue North to Twenty-fourth Avenue North, by constructing concrete walks thereon, in accordance with Resolution No. 589 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
